column4: From my search just now, the tubroprint driver might be your best option, it's not free though. The ip2200 driver may work though
i have installed the ip2200 driver  it doesn't print     it detects but no print
Oh ok, this is a post I found http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/showthread.php?s=063b511eece0269d5a920ddc4ae7c4c5&p=2523033#post2523033
If you can't get it to print, Turboprint definitely specifies support http://www.turboprint.de/english.html
